attributes.action: Send support to Turkey to tackle the fires threatening life
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government should support Turkey by sending firefighting troops to help extinguish the fires before anyone else has been killed.
attributes.background: Turkey is currently suffering devastating fires, they are endangering life and property.Sadly some people have already been killed by them. Civilians are forced to fight the fires themselves.Please sign to encourage the Government to send RAF support to extinguish the fires.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Help Turkey with the wildfires
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593834
